original_text: Then the old prophet went along the road and he found the body. It was lying on the road. The donkey and the lion were standing beside it. The lion had not eaten the body. It had not attacked the donkey.
korean_text: 그가 가서 본즉 그의 시체가 길에 버린 바 되었고 나귀와 사자는 그 시체 곁에 서 있는데 사자가 시체를 먹지도 아니하였고 나귀를 찢지도 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: Then the old prophet went along the road
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 늙은 선지자가 그 길을 따라 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: It was lying on the road
The donkey and the lion were standing beside it
sentences.korean_translation: 나귀와 사자가 그것 곁에 서 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: The lion had not eaten the body
It had not attacked the donkey
